column3: @sipa : I stand corrected: it fixes a variant of #2228 where no IBD was done if you start with an empty data directory and -reindex.\n
I take back my ACK:  this breaks unit tests. TestingSetup() in test/test_bitcoin.cpp needs to call InitBlockIndex, I think.\n
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/386037615ae02f972287a958d22a5bd2760626a7 for binaries and test log.\n
